metadata.title: Business User - Business Automation User Stories

user_stories.title: Customer Onboarding Automation
user_stories.story: As an operations manager, I want automated customer onboarding that can process applications, verify documents, and set up accounts so that I can reduce manual work and improve customer experience.
acceptance_criteria: Set up customer accounts and profiles
Send welcome emails and onboarding materials

user_stories.title: Invoice Processing Automation
user_stories.story: As an AP specialist, I want automated invoice processing that can extract data, validate information, and process payments so that I can handle high volumes efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Extract data from invoice images and PDFs
Validate invoice information against purchase orders
Route invoices for approval based on rules

user_stories.title: Employee Onboarding Workflow
user_stories.story: As an HR manager, I want automated employee onboarding that can handle paperwork, IT setup, and training scheduling so that I can ensure consistent onboarding experiences.
acceptance_criteria: Set up IT accounts and equipment

user_stories.title: Sales Lead Management
user_stories.story: As a sales manager, I want automated lead management that can qualify leads, assign them to sales reps, and track follow-up activities so that I can improve conversion rates.
acceptance_criteria: Automatically qualify leads based on criteria
Assign leads to appropriate sales representatives
Track lead progression through sales funnel

user_stories.title: Inventory Management Automation
user_stories.story: As an inventory manager, I want automated inventory management that can track stock levels, predict demand, and generate purchase orders so that I can optimize inventory levels.
acceptance_criteria: Predict demand based on historical data
